Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add circle/ellipse resize handles and fog undo/redo \(Ctrl+Z/Y\)

Circles/ellipses now show 4 corner resize handles instead of 48 vertex
handles. Dragging a corner regenerates the shape in real-time. Added full
undo/redo stack \(max 50\) for all fog mutations: draw, delete, move,
vertex edit, resize, and color change.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Extract shared token code into token-shared.js, persist tokens across reloads

- Extract duplicated token logic \(socket emits, context popup, color swatches,
  label input, utilities\) from gm.js and player.js into token-shared.js IIFE
- Both views now delegate to TokenShared.* for token operations
- Remove ownership-based token cleanup on disconnect so tokens survive
  page reloads \(kept in server memory per session\)
- Anchor color picker input to contextual popup via CSS positioning
- Use mousedown for popup outside-dismiss to prevent same-click race

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
